text: This is a list of hospitals in Guyana. The following hospitals are located in Guyana: * Davis Memorial Hospital, Georgetown, * Georgetown Public Hospital, Georgetown main referral hospital. * New Amsterdam Public Hospital, New Amsterdam * Mahaica Hospital, Mahaica, Demerara-Mahaica * Medical Arts Center, Georgetown * Prasad's Hospital, Georgetown * St. Joseph Mercy Hospital, Georgetown, Catholic non-profit hospital * Woodland Hospital, Georgetown. The construction of the Speciality Hospital at Liliendaal, East Coast Demerara has been cancelled in 2017. ==References== *List Guyana Hospitals Hospitals
title: List of hospitals in Guyana
